verses.verse: Now <S%H6583>Pashur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H564>Immer<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> was also <S%H5057>chief<s%> <S%H5057>governor<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things.<s%>

Then <S%H6583>Pashur<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> him in the <S%H4115>stocks<s%> that were in the <S%H5945>high<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass on the <S%H4283>morrow,<s%> that <S%H6583>Pashur<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> out of the <S%H4115>stocks.<s%> Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> to him, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has not <S%H7121>called<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H6583>Pashur,<s%> but <S%H4036>Magormissabib.<s%>

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H5414>make<s%> you a <S%H4032>terror<s%> to yourself, and to <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H157>friends:<s%> and they shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>behold<s%> it: and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and he shall <S%H1540>carry<s%> them <S%H1540>captive<s%> into <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and shall <S%H5221>slay<s%> them with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

Moreover I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2633>strength<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3018>labors<s%> thereof, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3366>precious<s%> things thereof, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> shall <S%H962>spoil<s%> them, and <S%H3947>take<s%> them, and <S%H935>carry<s%> them to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

And you, <S%H6583>Pashur,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in your <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H3212>go<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity:<s%> and you shall <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> you shall <S%H4191>die,<s%> and shall be <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> you, and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H157>friends,<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H1992><s%> you have <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H8267>lies.<s%>

O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> you have <S%H6601>deceived<s%> me, and I was <S%H6601>deceived;<s%> you are <S%H2388>stronger<s%> than I, and have <S%H3201>prevailed:<s%> I am in <S%H7814>derision<s%> <S%H3605>daily,<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> one <S%H3932>mocks<s%> me.

For <S%H1767>since<s%> I <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> I <S%H2199>cried<s%> out, I <S%H7121>cried<s%> <S%H2555>violence<s%> and <S%H7701>spoil;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H1961>made<s%> a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> to me, and a <S%H7047>derision,<s%> <S%H3605>daily.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>

Then I <S%H559>said,<s%> I will not make <S%H2142>mention<s%> of him, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> any <S%H5750>more<s%> in his <S%H8034>name.<s%> But his word was in my <S%H3820>heart<s%> as a <S%H1197>burning<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H6113>shut<s%> up in my <S%H6106>bones,<s%> and I was <S%H3811>weary<s%> with <S%H3557>forbearing,<s%> and I <S%H3201>could<s%> not stay.

For I <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1681>defaming<s%> of <S%H7227>many,<s%> <S%H4032>fear<s%> on <S%H5437>every<s%> <S%H5439>side.<s%> <S%H5046>Report,<s%> say they, and we will <S%H5046>report<s%> it. <S%H3605>All<s%> my <S%H7965>familiars<s%> <S%H8104>watched<s%> for my <S%H6761>halting,<s%> saying, <S%H194>Peradventure<s%> he will be <S%H6601>enticed,<s%> and we shall <S%H3201>prevail<s%> against him, and we shall <S%H3947>take<s%> our <S%H5360>revenge<s%> on him.

But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is with me as a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H6184>terrible<s%> one: <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> my <S%H7291>persecutors<s%> shall <S%H3782>stumble,<s%> and they shall not <S%H3201>prevail:<s%> they shall be <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H954>ashamed;<s%> for they shall not <S%H7919>prosper:<s%> their <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H3639>confusion<s%> shall <S%H3808>never<s%> be <S%H7911>forgotten.<s%>

But, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> that <S%H974>try<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H3629>reins<s%> and the <S%H3820>heart,<s%> let me <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> on them: for to you have I <S%H1540>opened<s%> my <S%H7379>cause.<s%>

<S%H7891>Sing<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H1984>praise<s%> you the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> for he has <S%H5337>delivered<s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H34>poor<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H7489>evildoers.<s%>

<S%H779>Cursed<s%> be the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> I was <S%H3205>born:<s%> let not the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> my <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> me be <S%H1288>blessed.<s%>

<S%H779>Cursed<s%> be the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1319>brought<s%> <S%H1319>tidings<s%> to my <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> A <S%H2145>man<s%> <S%H1121>child<s%> is <S%H3205>born<s%> to you; making him very <S%H8056>glad.<s%>

And let that <S%H376>man<s%> be as the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2015>overthrew,<s%> and <S%H5162>repented<s%> not: and let him <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H2201>cry<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and the <S%H8643>shouting<s%> at <S%H6256>noontide;<s%>

<S%H834>Because<s%> he <S%H4191>slew<s%> me not from the <S%H7358>womb;<s%> or that my <S%H517>mother<s%> might have <S%H1961>been<s%> my <S%H6913>grave,<s%> and her <S%H7358>womb<s%> to be <S%H5769>always<s%> <S%H2030>great<s%> with me.

<S%H4100>Why<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> I <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H7358>womb<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H5999>labor<s%> and <S%H3015>sorrow,<s%> that my <S%H3117>days<s%> should be <S%H3615>consumed<s%> with <S%H1322>shame?<s%>
